WorkItem.Description: PVDesktop installer is adding a shortcut to the "startup folder" in the start menu. This means every time that you start your computer, it restarts PVDesktop.... Please change...
WorkItem.Summary: Critical: Installer shouldn't install to "Startup" start menu

Comments.Message:
I'm sorry. 
It's may false. It have one check box in Install to Go about Startup menu.  
I didn't though it run every time. I will unchecked it for the new setup file.
